p: Annotations for 23 molecular profiles published here include the response data on radioactive iodine therapy, of them 10 were for the treatment responders and 13 for the non-responders. This sampling is modest in terms of robust biomarker discovery. However, these datasets can be combined with the previously published or future data collections e.g. using harmonization of gene expression profiles data formats [ 85]. Alternatively, advanced methods of reducing data dimensionality can be applied in order to make use of machine learning and other artificial intelligence approaches to further analyze the data [ 86, 87, 88].
